testcase.classname: User could register with valid data
testcase.name: User register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to registration page...................................passed When user enters valid data.................................................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user registered successfully...........................................passed

testcase.classname: User could log in with valid data
testcase.name: User login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enters email "m_emad@gmail.com" and password "123456".............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user log in successfully...............................................passed And user go to home page....................................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: Logged User search for a product
testcase.system-out: When user search for a product "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch"..................passed Then user got relative result of product searched for "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch".passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: Logged User switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: When user choose a currency from the dropdown on the top left...............passed Then user change currency and the price of products converts to the new currency symbol.passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: Logged user select different Categories
testcase.system-out: When user hover on a main category..........................................passed And user select a sub category..............................................passed Then user navigate to category page.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could could filter with color
testcase.name: Logged user filter with color
testcase.system-out: When user hover on a main category..........................................passed And user select a sub category..............................................passed And user selects color......................................................passed Then user get the result data with the chosen color.........................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.name: Logged user select different tags
testcase.system-out: When user hover on a main category..........................................passed And user select a sub category..............................................passed And user selects tag........................................................passed Then user get the result data with the chosen tag...........................passed

testcase.name: Logged user add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: When user add a product to shopping cart....................................passed And user add another product to shopping cart...............................passed And user navigate to shopping cart page.....................................passed Then user get the added products on the shopping cart.......................passed

testcase.name: Logged user add different products to Wishlist

testcase.name: User create successful Order
testcase.system-out: When user navigate to shopping cart page....................................passed And user accept the terms of service........................................passed And user click on checkout button...........................................passed And user fill the billing address data......................................passed And user continue with default values.......................................passed And user confirm the order..................................................passed Then user create a successful order.........................................passed
